name: NSSF-CON.05-test
query:
select
  ss.company as "Company::120",
  cp.registration_details as "Company Address::200",
  emp.employee as "Emp ID::120", 
  ss.employee_name as "Employee Name::360", 
  format(sum(ss.gross_pay), 2) as "Gross Pay::180",
  format(sum(ss.gross_pay * 0.2), 2) as "Contribution::180",
  emp.social_security_number as "Membership No::180"
from `tabSalary Slip` ss 
left outer join `tabSalary Detail` sd on sd.parent = ss.name 
left outer join `tabEmployee` emp on ss.employee = emp.name and emp.social_security_fund = 'NSSF'
inner join `tabCompany` cp on ss.company = cp.company_name
where sd.salary_component = 'Basic'
group by ss.employee_name, ss.designation, emp.gender, emp.date_of_birth
having sum(ss.gross_pay) > 0

name: Payee Withheld Detail
query:
select 
  ss.start_date as "Start Date::100",
  ss.employee_name as "Employee Name::180",
  ss.designation as "Job Title::140",
  sum(sdbasic.amount) as "Basic Salary:Currency:120",
  sum(sdhousing.amount) as "Housing Allowance:Currency:120",
  sum(sdti.amount - sdbasic.amount - sdhousing.amount) as "Other Allw and Benefits:Currency:120",
  sum(ss.gross_pay) as "Gross Pay:Currency:120",
  sum(sdnssf.amount) as "NSSF:Currency:120",
  sum(sdpaye.amount) as "PAYE:Currency:120"
from `tabSalary Slip` ss 
left outer join `tabSalary Detail` sdbasic on sdbasic.parent = ss.name and sdbasic.salary_component = 'Basic'
left outer join `tabSalary Detail` sdhousing on sdhousing.parent = ss.name and sdhousing.salary_component = 'Housing'
left outer join `tabSalary Detail` sdti on sdti.parent = ss.name and sdti.salary_component = 'TI'
left outer join `tabSalary Detail` sdnssf on sdnssf.parent = ss.name and sdnssf.salary_component = 'NSSF'
left outer join `tabSalary Detail` sdpaye on sdpaye.parent = ss.name and sdpaye.salary_component = 'PAYE'
left join `tabEmployee` emp on ss.employee = emp.name
group by ss.start_date, ss.employee_name, ss.designation, emp.gender, emp.date_of_birth
having sum(ss.gross_pay) > 0

name: ITX219.01.E - SDL Monthly Return
query:
SELECT	sum(gross_pay) as "Gross Pay:Currency:",
	sum(sd.amount) as "SDL:Currency:",
	ss.company as "Company:Data:0",
	cmp.tax_id as "TIN:Data:0",
	cmp.email as "Email:Data:0",
	cmp.phone_no as "Phone:Data:0",
	cmp.fax as "Fax Number:Data:0",
	cmp.p_o_box as "P O Box:Data:0",
	cmp.street as "Street:Data:0",
	cmp.plot_number as "Plot Number:Data:0",
	cmp.block_number as "Block Number:Data:0",
	cmp.city as "City:Data:0"
FROM `tabSalary Slip` ss  LEFT OUTER JOIN `tabSalary Detail` sd	ON sd.parent = ss.name 
			  LEFT OUTER JOIN `tabCompany` cmp 	ON ss.company = cmp.name 
WHERE	ss.start_date >= %(from_date)s
AND	ss.end_date <= %(to_date)s
ORDER BY ss.start_date

name: SDL Report
query:
SELECT ss.start_date as "Salary Period Start", 
       ss.end_date as "Salary Period End", 
       e.employee_name as "Employee Name", 
       ss.gross_pay as "Employee Gross Pay", 
       sd.amount as "PAYE contribution", 
       ss.gross_pay * ps.value / 100 as "SDL contribution"
FROM   `tabSalary Slip` ss 
       INNER JOIN `tabSalary Detail` sd 
               ON ss.name = sd.parent 
                  AND sd.salary_component = "PAYE" 
       INNER JOIN `tabEmployee` e 
               ON ss.employee = e.name 
                  AND (e.relieving_date >= ss.start_date OR e.relieving_date is null)
       INNER JOIN `tabSingles` ps 
               ON ps.doctype = "Payware Settings" 
                  AND ps.field = "skills_development_levy" 
WHERE  ss.docstatus = 1 
GROUP  BY ss.start_date, 
          ss.end_date, 
          e.employee_name

name: Net Pay
query:
select 
  ss.employee_name as "Employee Name::120", 
  YEAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) - YEAR(emp.date_of_birth) as "Age::80",
  emp.date_of_birth as "Date of Birth::80",
  emp.gender as "Sex::80",
  ss.designation as "Job Title::80",
  sum(sd.amount) as "Basic Salary:Currency:80",
  sum(ss.gross_pay) as "Total Earnings:Currency:80",
  sum(ss.gross_pay - sd.amount) as "Annual Allowance:Currency:80"
from `tabSalary Slip` ss 
left join `tabSalary Detail` sd on sd.parent = ss.name 
left join `tabEmployee` emp on ss.employee = emp.name
where sd.salary_component = 'Basic'
group by ss.employee_name, ss.designation, emp.gender, emp.date_of_birth
having sum(ss.gross_pay) > 0

name: WCF-3
query:
select emp.wcf_number as "wcf_number::120", 
       emp.first_name as "firstname::120", 
       emp.middle_name as "middlename::120", 
       emp.last_name as "lastname::120", 
       emp.gender as "gender::75", 
       emp.date_of_birth as "dob::70", 
       sum(sd.amount) as "basicpay::100",
       sum(ss.gross_pay) as "grosspay::100",
       ss.designation as "job_title::200",
       'PERMANENT' as "employement_category::150",
       emp.national_identity as "national_id::200"
from `tabSalary Slip` ss left join `tabSalary Detail` sd on sd.parent = ss.name 
                          left join `tabEmployee` emp on ss.employee = emp.name
where sd.salary_component = 'Basic'
  and ss.start_date >= %(from_date)s
  and ss.end_date <= %(to_date)s
group by ss.employee_name, ss.designation, emp.gender, emp.date_of_birth
having sum(ss.gross_pay) > 0

name: NSSF-CON.05
query:
SELECT ss.company AS "Company::", 
       CONCAT_WS(' ', 'P O Box', pobox.value) AS "Company Address::", 
       ss.employee AS "Emp ID::", 
       ss.employee_name AS "Employee Name::", 
       SUM(ss.gross_pay) AS "Gross Pay:Currency:", 
       SUM(sd.amount * 2) AS "Contribution:Currency:",  
       emp.pension_fund_number AS "Membership No::", 
       emp.national_identity AS "National ID::", 
       np.payment_date AS "Payment Date::", 
       np.payment_method  AS "Payment Method::", 
       np.payment_reference_number AS "Ref No.::",
       social.value AS "NSSF Employer No:Data:0",
       social_office.value AS "NSSF Office:Data:0",
       pobox.value AS "P O Box:Data:0",
       city.value AS "City:Data:0",
       date_format(ss.start_date, '%%M') AS "Contribution Month:Data:0",
       date_format(ss.start_date, '%%Y') AS "Contribution Year:Data:0"
FROM `tabSalary Slip` ss LEFT OUTER JOIN `tabSalary Detail` sd ON sd.parent = ss.name 
                         LEFT OUTER JOIN `tabEmployee` emp ON ss.employee = emp.name AND emp.pension_fund = 'NSSF' 
				         INNER JOIN `tabCompany` cp ON ss.company = cp.company_name 
                         LEFT OUTER JOIN `tabNSSF Payments` np ON np.payroll_month BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s 
                         JOIN `tabSingles` social ON   social.doctype = "Payware Settings" AND social.field = "social_security_fund_registration_number"
                         JOIN `tabSingles` social_office ON   social_office.doctype = "Payware Settings" AND social_office.field = "social_security_fund_registration_district"
                         JOIN `tabSingles` pobox ON   pobox.doctype = "Payware Settings" AND pobox.field = "p_o_box"
                         JOIN `tabSingles` city ON   city.doctype = "Payware Settings" AND city.field = "city"
WHERE sd.salary_component = 'NSSF' 
AND   ss.docstatus = 1 
AND   ss.start_date >= %(from_date)s
AND   ss.end_date <= %(to_date)s
GROUP BY ss.employee_name, ss.designation, emp.gender, emp.date_of_birth 
HAVING  SUM(ss.gross_pay) > 0

name: ITX 215.01.E - PAYE Withheld Part 1
query:
SELECT          MIN(ss.start_date)  AS "Start Date::100", 
                MAX(ss.end_date) AS "End Date::100", 
                ss.employee_name AS "Employee Name:Data:0",
                SUM(IF (sd.salary_component = 'Basic', sd.amount, 0)) AS "Basic Salary:Currency:0",
                SUM(IF (sd.salary_component = 'Housing', sd.amount, 0)) AS "Housing:Currency:0",
                SUM(IF (sd.salary_component = 'TI', sd.amount, 0)) AS "Other Allw and Benefits:Currency:0",
                SUM(IF (sd.salary_component = 'Basic', ss.gross_pay, 0)) AS "Gross Pay:Currency:0",
                SUM(IF (sd.salary_component = 'NSSF', sd.amount, 0)) AS "NSSF:Currency:0", 
                SUM(IF (sd.salary_component = 'PAYE', sd.amount, 0)) AS "PAYE:Currency:0", 
                ss.company AS "Company:Data:0", 
                cmp.tax_id AS "TIN:Data:0", 
                cmp.email AS "Email:Data:0", 
                cmp.phone_no AS "Phone:Data:0", 
                cmp.fax AS "Fax Number:Data:0", 
                pwspob.value AS "P O Box:Data:0", 
                pwsst.value AS "Street:Data:0", 
                pwspn.value AS "Plot Number:Data:0",
                pwsbn.value AS "Block Number:Data:0",
                pwscty.value AS "City:Data:0"
FROM            `tabSalary Slip` ss LEFT OUTER JOIN `tabSalary Detail` sd ON ss.name = sd.parent
                                    LEFT OUTER JOIN `tabCompany` cmp ON ss.company = cmp.name 
                                    JOIN            `tabSingles` pwspob ON pwspob.doctype = "Payware Settings" AND pwspob.field = "p_o_box" 
                                    JOIN            `tabSingles` pwsst ON pwsst.doctype = "Payware Settings" AND pwsst.field = "street" 
                                    JOIN            `tabSingles` pwspn ON pwspn.doctype = "Payware Settings" AND pwspn.field = "plot_number" 
                                    JOIN            `tabSingles` pwsbn ON pwsbn.doctype = "Payware Settings" AND pwsbn.field = "block_number" 
                                    JOIN            `tabSingles` pwscty ON  pwscty.doctype = "Payware Settings" AND pwscty.field = "city" 
WHERE           ss.start_date >= %(from_date)s 
AND             ss.end_date <= %(to_date)s 
AND             ss.docstatus = 1 
GROUP BY        ss.employee_name

name: ITX 215.01.E - PAYE Withheld Part 2
query:
SELECT          MIN(ss.start_date)                                      AS "Start Date::100", 
                MAX(ss.end_date)                                        AS "End Date::100", 
                ss.employee                                             AS "Employee No:Data:0",
                ss.employee_name                                        AS "Employee Name:Data:0",
                SUM(IF (sd.salary_component = 'Basic', sd.amount, 0))   AS "Basic Salary:Currency:0",
                SUM(IF (sd.salary_component = 'Housing', sd.amount, 0)) AS "Housing:Currency:0",
                SUM(IF (sd.salary_component = 'TI', sd.amount, 0))      AS "Other Allw and Benefits:Currency:0",
                SUM(IF (sd.salary_component = 'Basic', ss.gross_pay, 0))AS "Gross Pay:Currency:0",
                SUM(IF (sd.salary_component = 'NSSF', sd.amount, 0))    AS "NSSF:Currency:0", 
                SUM(IF (sd.salary_component = 'PAYE', sd.amount, 0))    AS "PAYE:Currency:0", 
                ss.company                                              AS "Company:Data:0", 
                cmp.tax_id                                              AS "TIN:Data:0"
FROM            `tabSalary Slip` ss	LEFT OUTER JOIN `tabSalary Detail` sd 	ON sd.parent = ss.name 
					LEFT OUTER JOIN `tabCompany` cmp 	ON ss.company = cmp.name 
WHERE           ss.start_date >= %(from_date)s 
AND             ss.end_date <= %(to_date)s 
AND             ss.docstatus = 1 
GROUP BY        ss.employee_name 
HAVING          SUM(ss.gross_pay) > 0

name: ITX 220.01.E - Employer’s Half Year Certificate
query:
SELECT	date_format(ss.start_date, "%%M") AS "Month:Data:",
	sum(gross_pay) AS "Gross Pay:Currency:",
	sum(sd.amount) AS "SDL:Currency:",
	ss.company AS "Company:Data:0",
	cmp.tax_id AS "TIN:Data:0",
	pws.value AS "SDL Rate:Data:0"
FROM `tabSalary Slip` ss  LEFT OUTER JOIN `tabSalary Detail` sd	ON sd.parent = ss.name 
			  LEFT OUTER JOIN `tabCompany` cmp 	ON ss.company = cmp.name 
			  JOIN `tabSingles` pws   ON pws.doctype = "Payware Settings" AND pws.field = 'skills_development_levy'
WHERE	sd.salary_component = 'SDL'
AND 	ss.start_date >= %(from_date)s
AND	ss.end_date <= %(to_date)s
AND     ss.docstatus = 1
GROUP BY date_format(ss.start_date, "%%M")
ORDER BY ss.start_date

name: ITX 219.01.E - SDL - Monthly Return
query:
SELECT sum(if(sd.parentfield = 'earnings' and sd.do_not_include_in_total = 0 and sc.sdl_emolument_category = 'Basic pay', sd.amount, 0)) as "Basic pay:Currency:",
       sum(if(sd.parentfield = 'earnings' and sd.do_not_include_in_total = 0 and sc.sdl_emolument_category = 'Leave pay', sd.amount, 0)) as "Leave pay:Currency:",
       sum(if(sd.parentfield = 'earnings' and sd.do_not_include_in_total = 0 and sc.sdl_emolument_category = 'Sick pay', sd.amount, 0)) as "Sick pay:Currency:",
       sum(if(sd.parentfield = 'earnings' and sd.do_not_include_in_total = 0 and sc.sdl_emolument_category = 'Payment in Lieu of Leave', sd.amount, 0)) as "Payment in Lieu of Leave:Currency:",
       sum(if(sd.parentfield = 'earnings' and sd.do_not_include_in_total = 0 and sc.sdl_emolument_category = 'Fees', sd.amount, 0)) as "Fees:Currency:",
       sum(if(sd.parentfield = 'earnings' and sd.do_not_include_in_total = 0 and sc.sdl_emolument_category = 'Commission', sd.amount, 0)) as "Commission:Currency:",
       sum(if(sd.parentfield = 'earnings' and sd.do_not_include_in_total = 0 and sc.sdl_emolument_category = 'Bonus', sd.amount, 0)) as "Bonus:Currency:",
       sum(if(sd.parentfield = 'earnings' and sd.do_not_include_in_total = 0 and sc.sdl_emolument_category = 'Gratuity', sd.amount, 0)) as "Gratuity:Currency:",
       sum(if(sd.parentfield = 'earnings' and sd.do_not_include_in_total = 0 and sc.sdl_emolument_category = 'Subsistence Allowance', sd.amount, 0)) as "Subsistence Allowance:Currency:",
       sum(if(sd.parentfield = 'earnings' and sd.do_not_include_in_total = 0 and sc.sdl_emolument_category = 'Traveling Allowance', sd.amount, 0)) as "Traveling Allowance:Currency:",
       sum(if(sd.parentfield = 'earnings' and sd.do_not_include_in_total = 0 and sc.sdl_emolument_category = 'Entertainment Allowance', sd.amount, 0)) as "Entertainment Allowance:Currency:",
       sum(if(sd.parentfield = 'earnings' and sd.do_not_include_in_total = 0 and sc.sdl_emolument_category = 'Housing Allowance', sd.amount, 0)) as "Housing Allowance:Currency:",
       sum(if(sd.parentfield = 'earnings' and sd.do_not_include_in_total = 0 and sc.sdl_emolument_category = 'Any Other Allowances', sd.amount, 0)) as "Any Other Allowances:Currency:",
       sum(if(sd.salary_component = 'SDL', sd.amount, 0)) as "SDL:Currency:",
       ss.company as "Company:Data:0",
       cmp.tax_id as "TIN:Data:0",
       cmp.email as "Email:Data:0",
       cmp.phone_no as "Phone:Data:0",
       cmp.fax as "Fax Number:Data:0",
       pwspob.value as "P O Box:Data:0",
       pwsst.value as "Street:Data:0",
       pwspn.value as "Plot Number:Data:0",
       pwsbn.value as "Block Number:Data:0",
       pwscty.value as "City:Data:0",
       pwssdl.value as "SDL Rate:Data:0",
       DATE_FORMAT(ss.start_date, '%%M %%Y') as "Month:Data:0"
FROM `tabSalary Slip` ss LEFT OUTER JOIN `tabSalary Detail` sd ON sd.parent = ss.name
                         LEFT OUTER JOIN `tabCompany` cmp ON ss.company = cmp.name 
                         LEFT OUTER JOIN `tabSalary Component` sc ON sd.salary_component = sc.name and sc.type = 'Earning'
                         JOIN `tabSingles` pwspob ON pwspob.doctype = "Payware Settings" and pwspob.field = "p_o_box"
                         JOIN `tabSingles` pwsst ON pwsst.doctype = "Payware Settings" and pwsst.field = "street"
                         JOIN `tabSingles` pwspn ON pwspn.doctype = "Payware Settings" and pwspn.field = "plot_number"
                         JOIN `tabSingles` pwsbn ON pwsbn.doctype = "Payware Settings" and pwsbn.field = "block_number"
                         JOIN `tabSingles` pwscty ON pwscty.doctype = "Payware Settings" and pwscty.field = "city"
                         JOIN `tabSingles` pwssdl ON pwssdl.doctype = "Payware Settings" and pwssdl.field = "skills_development_levy"
WHERE ss.start_date = %(from_date)s
AND ss.end_date = %(to_date)s
AND ss.docstatus = 1

name: ITX 300.01.E - Employment Taxes Payment Credit Slip
query:
SELECT  sum(if(sd.salary_component = 'SDL', sd.amount, 0)) as "SDL:Currency:",
		sum(if(sd.salary_component = 'PAYE', sd.amount, 0)) as "PAYE:Currency:",
		ss.company as "Company:Data:0",
		cmp.tax_id as "TIN:Data:0",
		cmp.email as "Email:Data:0",
		cmp.phone_no as "Phone:Data:0",
		cmp.fax as "Fax Number:Data:0",
		pwspob.value as "P O Box:Data:0",
		pwsst.value as "Street:Data:0",
		pwspn.value as "Plot Number:Data:0",
		pwsbn.value as "Block Number:Data:0",
		pwscty.value as "City:Data:0",
		pwssdl.value as "SDL Rate:Data:0",
		DATE_FORMAT(ss.start_date, '%%M %%Y') as "Month:Data:0"
FROM `tabSalary Slip` ss    LEFT OUTER JOIN `tabSalary Detail` sd ON sd.parent = ss.name 
							LEFT OUTER JOIN `tabCompany` cmp  ON ss.company = cmp.name 
							LEFT OUTER JOIN `tabSalary Component` sc ON sd.salary_component = sc.name
							JOIN `tabSingles` pwspob   ON pwspob.doctype = "Payware Settings" and pwspob.field = "p_o_box"
							JOIN `tabSingles` pwsst   ON pwsst.doctype = "Payware Settings" and pwsst.field = "street"
							JOIN `tabSingles` pwspn  ON pwspn.doctype = "Payware Settings" and pwspn.field = "plot_number"
							JOIN `tabSingles` pwsbn   ON pwsbn.doctype = "Payware Settings" and pwsbn.field = "block_number"
							JOIN `tabSingles` pwscty  ON pwscty.doctype = "Payware Settings" and pwscty.field = "city"
							JOIN `tabSingles` pwssdl  ON pwssdl.doctype = "Payware Settings" and pwssdl.field = "skills_development_levy"
WHERE ss.start_date = %(from_date)s
AND ss.end_date = %(to_date)s
AND ss.docstatus = 1
report_name: ITX 300.01.E - Employment Taxes Payment Credit Slip

name: Bank Report
query:
SELECT		date_format(ss.start_date, '%%M %%Y') AS "Month::140",
		ss.employee		AS "Employee ID::120", 
		ss.employee_name	AS "Employee Name::200", 
		ss.bank_account_no	AS "Account No.::120", 
		emp.bank_code		AS "Bank Code.::120", 
		ss.net_pay		AS "Net Pay:Currency:120",
		concat(cmp.abbr, '/', date_format(ss.start_date, '%%M %%Y/%%d')) AS "Payroll Entry::140",
		pe.cheque_number	AS "Cheque No.::120", 
		pe.cheque_date		AS "Cheque Date::120", 
		ss.company		AS "Company::120"
FROM 	`tabSalary Slip` ss
	LEFT JOIN `tabEmployee` emp ON ss.employee = emp.name
	LEFT JOIN `tabPayroll Entry` pe ON ss.payroll_entry = pe.name
	LEFT OUTER JOIN `tabCompany` cmp ON ss.company = cmp.name 
WHERE	emp.salary_mode = 'Bank'
AND 	ss.start_date >= %(from_date)s
AND 	ss.end_date <= %(to_date)s

name: Hold Payment
query: SELECT posting_date, employee, net_pay FROM `tabSalary Slip`
